PostgreSQL 8.3.0-2 (Linux: "PostgreSQL 8.1.4")
- License: Similar to the BSD or MIT licenses, see "Licence.txt"
- Used by the database backend "PLDatabasePostgreSQL" (external Windows dependencies: "comerr32.dll", "gssapi32.dll",
  "k5sprt32.dll", "krb5_32.dll", "libeay32.dll", "libiconv2.dll", "libintl3.dll", "libpq.dll", "ssleay32.dll")
- Download from: http://www.postgresql.org/
